answers.answer: Sounds like you are having a tough time.....Try making hot tea with lemon only. no honey or sugar. Yes it does taste a bit gross at first but it helps your throat so much. I hope you feel better soon. good luck

question: I am 30 weeks pregnant, last whole month I suffered from sore throat and cough, I couldnt take any medicine except ginger honey tea and sugary losenzes. Coughing stopped but throat ache is still persisting, the worst part is that all my regular lifestyle was badly affected which resulted in gestational diabetes. I am highly depressed because of both. Now I cant take honey as it shoots my sugar level and also avoiding the walk and other outdoor activities because of dreadful weather. Dont know how to cope with throat ache and sweetness.
title: throat ache in pregnancy
